entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with light wet snow and risk of hail. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:01 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers and wet flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:01 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:01 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
